api_list.name: Amazon Product Details
api_list.description: Amazon Product Details. You have to first go to scraperapi.com to obtain a unique API key before you can proceed. After registering, you will have 5,000  point to request with.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greens-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/product/B00NLZUM36"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greens-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greens-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/product/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greens-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
